name: Robin D. Dowell
content: DnA Lab | University of Colorado Boulder DnA Lab Research Publications Resources Education People Contact Dowell and Allen (DnA) Lab Research Education People The Dowell and Allen labs at the University of Colorado are part of the BioFrontiers Institute and the Department of Molecular, Cellular and Developmental Biology. We are also affiliated with the Department of Computer Science and the School of Medicine's Computational Bioscience Program.
